thread.title: Ron Kingsford named VP of Sales & Marketing
thread.title_full: Ron Kingsford named VP of Sales & Marketing

author: admin
title: Ron Kingsford named VP of Sales & Marketing
text:
VOX Network Solutions 
BRISBANE, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- VOX Network Solutions, a leading provider of solutions and services for enterprise businesses, recently announced that Ron Kingsford will lead global sales, business development and marketing as VP of Sales and Marketing. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151022006330/en/ 
“We are thrilled to have such an impressive industry leader head our sales and marketing efforts," said Scott Landis, President and CEO, VOX Network Solutions. "Ron has shown tremendous leadership as our Director of Sales. His industry experience and focus on customer experience is unmatched. We look forward to him continuing to lead our aggressive growth strategy and executing our purpose of Helping Companies Prosper.” 
Ron has over 20 years of sales and leadership experience in the technology industry. As Director of Sales for VOX he has been instrumental in VOX’s tremendous year over year growth. Prior to joining VOX, Ron served as a Major Account Executive with another Platinum Business Partner, where he managed accounts such as Williams Sonoma, CarMax, Northrop Grumman, Verisign, RR Donnelley, Gap, Hilton Hotels and other Fortune 500 organizations. 
Ron has held various management positions throughout his career including responsibility for a nationwide channel organization. Ron received his bachelor’s degree in Public Administration with a minor in City Planning from San Diego State University. 
About VOX Network Solutions 
VOX Network Solutions is a leading provider of converged voice and data solutions and services. VOX Network solutions provides these services in the cloud, on premise or a hybrid combination. The company’s extensive knowledge and expertise uniquely positions VOX as a sole-source provider of advanced communication networks to businesses across a wide range of industries. Learn more about VOX’s cloud brand at www.nustratus.com . 
VOX helps companies prosper by planning and implementing innovative technologies that accelerate business growth while protecting the bottom line. 
VOX has partnered with leading technology providers to deliver complete solutions for IP telephony, unified communications, contact centers, data networking, security, wireless and mobility. VOX’s engineering resources excel at network infrastructure planning and design, installation and integration, maintenance and monitoring. 
Headquartered in the San Francisco Bay Area, VOX Network Solutions customers can be found across the United States. Visit the company online: www.voxns.com | Twitter @VOXNS | VOX Network Solutions Products and Services | LinkedIn | www.facebook.com/VOXNS View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151022006330/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
